titleStmt.title: A dyalogue bitwene the playntife and the defendaunt. Compyled by Wylliam Caluerley, whyles he was prisoner in the towre of London
titleStmt.author: Calverley, William.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
